MonsterTrait.Name: Trampling Charge
MonsterTrait.Text: If the loxoda moves at least 20 feet straight toward a Large or smaller creature it then attacks with a stomp, the stomp attack is made with advantage. If the stomp attack hits, the target must also succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The loxoda makes two attacks, but no more than one of them can be a maul or javelin attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Maul
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Stomp
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Javelin
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage.
